statements: DELETE FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_name = 'Summer Sale' AND segment_filter = 'VIP';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE segment = 'VIP' AND preferences->>'newsletter' = 'true';
DELETE FROM campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-02-01';
DELETE FROM campaign_targets WHERE campaign_id = 1 AND status = 'active';
DELETE FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_type = 'email' OR status = 'complete';
DELETE FROM CampaignMetrics WHERE customer_id = 100 AND campaign_id = 10;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND segment = 'New Customers';
